actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the payment of certain dividends by a cemetery corporation shall not deny such corporation its exemption under section 501(c)(13) of such Code.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit tax-exempt cemetery corporations to issue preferred stock and to pay dividends on such stock.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the payment of certain dividends by a cemetery corporation shall not deny such corporation its exemption under section 501(c)(13) of such Code.
